questions.1: Can I change my plans later?

answers.0: You get a 14-day free trial where you get access to all the features for unlimited users & clients. After the 14-day free trial, you will get the option of choosing our standard package or contacting sales to further continue using it.

who_we_are.title: Who We Are
who_we_are.description: Founded on February 10-2023, ATPi is a credit bassed & equity gathering investment firm which only deals in 'Halal' ways.
who_we_are.des: Here we deal with business, not with interest. Making assests & gaining profitwith idle money is the motto.

mission.title: Our Mission and Vision
mission.description: Making visible assets like land, building, start ups, property etc.Growing our own businesses where we are the master.Investing in other's profitable business.

noRiba.title: No Interest-Based (Riba) Transactions
noRiba.description: ATP Investment strictly avoids any investment that involves interest, aligning with Islamic financial laws.

riskSharing.title: Risk-Sharing Model
riskSharing.description: Instead of profiting from interest, we engage in partnerships and profit-sharing models like Mudarabah (investment partnerships) and Musharakah (joint ventures).

halalInvestment.title: Ethical & Halal Investments
halalInvestment.description: We do not invest in businesses involving alcohol, gambling, speculation, or unethical activities.

assetBacked.title: Asset-Backed Investments
assetBacked.description: We focus on tangible assets like real estate, halal stocks, and ethical startups.

compliant.title: 100% Shariah-compliant
compliant.description: Free from riba and unethical practices.

trusted.title: A trusted name in Sunnah-based investing

realEstate.title: Shariah-Compliant Real Estate Investments
realEstate.description: Property investments with ethical and transparent financing.

startupFunding.title: Halal Business & Startup Funding
startupFunding.description: Supporting businesses that align with Islamic finance.

wealthManagement.title: Wealth Management (Without Interest)
wealthManagement.description: Ethical asset growth without relying on riba-based financial products.

stockMarket.title: Islamic Stock Market & Trading
stockMarket.description: Investments in halal stock exchanges and businesses.

discover_investments: Discover and invest in promising projects
